choices.choice: Why are you looking at me like that?

dialog.text: Oh, sorry.. It's just that you have a sword too, but not me ! They say i'm too little. That's unfair !

choices.choice: Looks like you need a hand.

dialog.text: Not me ! My older brother.. I'm not allowed to leave the camp, the chief always refuse. But my brother ! His name is Gorkr, and he forgot his ring ! It's like a lucky charm for him, I don't want him to get hurt.. If you're allowed to leave, could you please give it to him ? Please !

choices.choice: You'll get one when you grow up. Eventually.
